title: Unify Secret Key Management
details: The 'secret_key' in config.py has a hardcoded default. Consider forcing an environment variable in production or generating a random one if not provided, to improve security.

title: Review SQLite Path Configuration
details: Currently, the SQLite path is constructed in agent/database.py. It might be cleaner to let agent/config.py handle the default path construction if DATABASE_URL is missing.
